Header: PM to Introduce a Modernized Curriculum to Schools
Content: Prime Minister Ranil Wickramasinghe says that a modern education system is scheduled to be introduced to Sri Lanka within next two years. The Premier made this remark at a function held in Newstead College, Negombo in celebration of its 200 th anniversary. The Premier also noted that the current curriculums should be changed and amended to go on par with world trends.
